pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw: There was a discussion about this with @sloretz and we decided that it would make the most sense for the `PLUGIN_API_VERSION` of the first release to be 1 (because it would be kind of weird if the API version of our first release were... 3 or 4+). Since we're still in the pre-release + development/testing stage and our only users are internal, we're keeping it at 1 and not worrying about backwards compatibility until the first official release.
content.html: There was a discussion about this with @sloretz and we decided that it would make the most sense for the PLUGIN_API_VERSION of the first release to be 1 (because it would be kind of weird if the API version of our first release were... 3 or 4+). Since we're still in the pre-release + development/testing stage and our only users are internal, we're keeping it at 1 and not worrying about backwards compatibility until the first official release.
